Returns: The number of spans occupied by this View.
getSpanSize().Description: Returns the number of spans occupied by this View. If the View not laid out yet, the return value is undefined.

Returns: The span index of the View.
getSpanIndex().Description: Returns the current span index of this View. If the View is not laid out yet, the return value is undefined. Starting with RecyclerView @B_android#support#v7#widget#GridLayoutManager#SpanSizeLookup#getSpanIndex_E@. If the View occupies multiple spans, span with the minimum index is returned.

ClassDesc: LayoutParams used by GridLayoutManager. Note that if the orientation is @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearLayoutManager#VERTICAL_E@, the width parameter is ignored and if the orientation is @B_android#support#v7#widget#LinearLayoutManager#HORIZONTAL_E@ the height parameter is ignored because child view is expected to fill all of the space given to it.
